AppFolderName._message.comment: Application folder name for uploaded documents

AppDescription.message: View, edit, and create Office documents in your browser.

AppLongDescription.message:
Built for Chrome – Use Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Sway Online without needing Office installed.

Create with confidence – Use familiar formatting and layout options to express your ideas in full fidelity.

Work on the go – Get to your files from anywhere, thanks to integration with OneDrive and OneDrive for Business.

By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/officechromeextensionterms

Privacy Policy: http://aka.ms/privacy

AppLongDescriptionEdge.message:
Office browser extension puts an icon on the Microsoft Edge toolbar that gives you direct access to your Office files, whether they are stored online or on your computer.

Office web extension can open files stored in OneDrive and OneDrive for Business.

You get the features of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Sway right in your browser without needing Office installed.

By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions:
AppLongDescriptionEdge._message.comment: Application long description for Microsoft Edge

You may use a copy of this supplement with each validly licensed copy of the software. You may not use the supplement if you do not have a license for the software. The license terms for the software apply to your use of this supplement.

UploadToOneDriveBusinessLabel._message.comment: Label text for local file picker in Edge for O365 users

AppListLabel._message.comment: Label text for app list header

RecentDocsLabel._message.comment: Label text for opening recent documents

CreateDocsMessageLabel._message.comment: Label text for document creation to appear in recents list

DocumentsNotFoundMessageLabel.message: We can't get the list of your recent documents right now.
DocumentsNotFoundMessageLabel._message.comment: Message to display when we receive an error call the MRU service

LoadingRecentsLabel._message.comment: Label to display while getting recents list

CreateNewLabel._message.comment: Label text for creating new document

OfflineLabel.message: You're offline. Please re-connect to use Office browser extension for Chrome.
OfflineLabel._message.comment: Label to tell user they are working offline

SignInLabel._message.comment: Label text for Sign in link

SignInMSALabel.message: Sign in with a Microsoft account
SignInMSALabel._message.comment: Label text for Sign in to MSA link

SignInO365Label.message: Sign in with a work or school account
SignInO365Label._message.comment: Label text for Sign in to O365 link

SignOutLabel._message.comment: Label text for Sign out link

CreateAccountLabel._message.comment: Label text for account creation link

TelemetrySettingLabel.message: Automatically send data to help us improve our products.

WebRedirectSettingLabel.message: Open Office files directly in the browser with Office.
WebRedirectSettingLabel._message.comment: Label text for web document redirect checkbox

MoreFilesLabel._message.comment: Label to view more recent documents

SignInHeaderLabel.message: Where do you want to save your files?
SignInHeaderLabel._message.comment: Label text for sign in location

FileTypeErrorMessage.message: The file type is not supported. Please choose a Word, Excel or PowerPoint document.
FileTypeErrorMessage._message.comment: Text for file type error message

FeedbackOverall.message: What kind of feedback do you have?

NotificationFileAccess.message: In the Chrome extension settings, select the "Allow access to file URLs" checkbox if you want to drag and drop files into Chrome.

NotificationFileMaxSizeByteLimitReached.message: Office browser extension is unable to open your document because of the size.  Please upload directly to OneDrive to open the document.

NotificationFileUploadFailureGeneric.message: Sorry, we were unable to open your file.

NotificationFileUploadFailureServer.message: Sorry, we were unable to open your file.  Please try again at a later time.

NotificationFileUploadFailureUnsupported.message: Sorry, we were unable to open your file.  Please choose a file created with Word, Excel, or PowerPoint

NotificationFileUploadInProgress.message: We are currently uploading your document(s).

NotificationSetDefault.message: In the Files app, tap documents with two fingers to open with Office.

NotificationAutoSaveToOneDrive.message: We saved your file in the "Office extension" folder on your OneDrive.

NotificationAutoSaveToSharePoint.message: We saved your file in the "Office extension" folder on your OneDrive for Business.

NotificationNotSignedIn.message: Sign in to the extension to view and edit files in Office on the web.

NotificationUnsupportedFileType.message: Choose a file created with Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.

NotificationInvalidSubscription.message: Your Office 365 subscription may be expired or may not include OneDrive for Business. Check your subscription or log in with a Microsoft Account instead.

NotificationWebDocRedirect.message: The Office extension is opening your document in the browser
NotificationWebDocRedirect._message.comment: Text for web document redirect notification

NotificationWebDocRedirectButton._message.comment: Text for dismissing the web document redirect notification

OfficeOnlineAppName._message.comment: Text for directing to Office on the web

SharePermissionsTooltip.message: You don't have permission to share
SharePermissionsTooltip._message.comment: Text for HTML title attribute (Chrome only)

SharePermissionsErrorMessage._message.comment: Text for on-hover error message (Edge only)

MyAccountLabel._message.comment: Label text for my account page

EditorSpellingToggleLabel._message.comment: Label text for the toggle control that allows user to turn on or off spellchecking in Editor

EditorGrammarToggleLabel._message.comment: Label text for the toggle control that allows user to turn on or off grammar checking in Editor

EditorRefinementsToggleLabel._message.comment: Label text for the toggle control that allows user to turn on or off advanced grammar and style checking (refinements) in Editor

DisableEditorOnThisSiteLabel._message.comment: Label text for button that allows a user to disable the Editor feature on a specific page such as facebook.com or twitter.com. Expect host name to be passed in.

EnableEditorOnThisSiteLabel._message.comment: Label text for button that allows a user to enable back the Editor feature on a specific page such as facebook.com or twitter.com. Expect host name to be passed in.

EditorIsDisabledOnThisSiteLabel._message.comment: Label text for tells the user that the Editor feature has been disabled on a specific page such as facebook.com or twitter.com. Expect host name to be passed in.

EditorIsBlockedOnThisSiteLabel.message: Editor is not currently supported on $host$
EditorIsBlockedOnThisSiteLabel._message.comment: Label text for tells the user that the Editor feature has been blocked by the system or remotely by Microsoft on a specific page such as facebook.com or twitter.com and cannot be enabled by the user. Expect host name to be passed in.

EditorPreviewLabel._message.comment: Label shown at the right of the 'Microsoft Editor' brand name to signify that it is a preview. In English it will look like: 'Microsoft Editor (Preview)'. NOTE: as of 22 nov 2019 the brand name is subject to change in the next coming weeks.

ebx_appName._message.comment: Name that appears in the Chrome web store and in the app

ebx_appShortName._message.comment: Shortened name will be used in the app launcher or the new tab - maximum of 12 characters recommended

ebx_appDescription.message: Get spelling, grammar & style checking within the browser as you type across most websites.
ebx_appDescription._message.comment: A plain text string (no HTML or other formatting; no more than 132 characters) that describes the standalone version of the extension

ebx_appDescriptionWithOffice.message: View, edit and create Office files within the browser and get spelling, grammar & style checking as you type across most websites.
ebx_appDescriptionWithOffice._message.comment: A plain text string (no HTML or other formatting; no more than 132 characters) that describes the extension integrated with the Office browser extension

ebx_appLongDescription.message:
Editor is your writing assistant – Editor marks issues with red, blue, or gold underline for spelling, grammar, and stylistic issues, respectively. Hover over the underlined word, and then choose the suggestion you want, or learn more about the error and how to correct it.

Create with confidence – Editor provides enhanced proofing tools for Office 365 subscribers. Behind the scenes, intelligent services identify spelling, grammar, and stylistic issues.

By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://aka.ms/editorchromeextensionterms

Privacy Policy: https://aka.ms/privacy

ebx_appLongDescriptionEdge.message:
Editor puts an icon on the Microsoft Edge toolbar that enables advanced proofing.

By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions:
ebx_appLongDescriptionEdge._message.comment: Application long description for Microsoft Edge

ebx_copyrightLabel._message.comment: Label text for copyright in web store

ebx_optionsPageTitle._message.comment: Title of the settings page, composed with the short app name

ebx_settings._message.comment: Used in the html title of the settings page

ebx_proofingLanguage._message.comment: Label for the proofing language setting dropdown

ebx_proofingLanguagePlaceHolder._message.comment: Placeholder value for the proofing language setting dropdown

ebx_userExcludedUrlsTextBoxCaption.message: You have disabled proofing on the sites listed below. Editor may be automatically disabled on additional sites with sensitive content or slow loading speeds.
ebx_userExcludedUrlsTextBoxCaption._message.comment: Caption for control holding list of websites not to proof

ebx_userBlockedSites._message.comment: Caption for control holding list of websites not to proof

ebx_userExcludedUrlsErrorCaption._message.comment: Error caption displayed when incorrect URLs are entered in textbox

ebx_userExcludedUrlErrorCaption._message.comment: Error caption displayed when incorrect URL is entered in textbox

ebx_showSpellingAndGrammarToggleCaption._message.comment: Caption for show editor and spelling toggle

ebx_showSynonymsToggleCaption._message.comment: Caption for show synonyms toggle on the settings page

ebx_comingSoonTooltipTitle._message.comment: Tooltip title for features that are going to be implemented in a future version

ebx_changeAllCommandLabel._message.comment: Label for the Change All context menu item in the dropdown menu in the far end of the suggestion button

ebx_changeSettingsCommandLabel._message.comment: Label for the Change Setting context menu item in the callout

ebx_moreButtonArialLabel._message.comment: Accessibility label for the more button ('...') in callout

ebx_ignoreAllButtonLabel._message.comment: Label for the ignore button in callout

ebx_suggestionMoreActionsArialLabel._message.comment: Accessibility label for the more actions button for a suggestion in the callout

ebx_brandText._message.comment: Product brand name displayed in the bottom right of the callout

ebx_brandTextArialLabel._message.comment: Accessibility label for product brand name

ebx_brandTextTooltipTitle._message.comment: Tooltip for the Editor brand text in callout

ebx_brandTextBrandName._message.comment: Brand name to be displayed in the bottom right of the callout

ebx_showSynonyms._message.comment: This is an action. Dropdown menu option. When clicked the synonyms will be rendered.

ebx_hideSynonyms._message.comment: This is an action. Dropdown menu option. When clicked the synonyms will be hidden.

ebx_deleteRepeatedWord._message.comment: This is an action. Callout menu option. When clicked the repeated word will be removed from the proofed text. Square brackets are part of the message.

ebx_asInSynonyms._message.comment: This is a text for screen readers, connecting the suggestions with its synonyms, for example: 'fat as in overweight, thick'

ebx_goPremiumLine._message.comment: This is not an action. This is a text in front of 'Go premium' link with reasoning to buy a subscription.

ebx_goPremiumLinkText._message.comment: This is an action. This is a text of a link to buy a premium subscription.

ebx_checkSpelling._message.comment: This is an action. It's a text for a button that toggles the setting On and Off.

ebx_checkGrammar._message.comment: This is an action. It's a text for a button that toggles the setting On and Off.

ebx_checkForRefinements._message.comment: This is an action. It's a text for a button that toggles the setting On and Off.

ebx_addAnotherSite._message.comment: Caption for the button to add a web-site to the list of blocked web-sites.

ebx_goPremiumExplained.message: Get Editor's advanced writing ideas, 1 TB of OneDrive storage, and premium features in all Office 365 apps.
ebx_goPremiumExplained._message.comment: Text on the settings page explaining the advantages of the premium subscription.

ebx_addAnotherSiteAriaLabel._message.comment: Screen-reader label for the button to add a web-site to the list of blocked web-sites.

ebx_addAnotherSiteSubmit.message: Add site to the list of blocked sites
ebx_addAnotherSiteSubmit._message.comment: ARIA label for the button to submit the entered web-site to the list of blocked web-sites. This is an action.

ebx_addAnotherSiteCancel.message: Cancel adding site to the list of blocked sites.
ebx_addAnotherSiteCancel._message.comment: ARIA label for the button to cancel site adding to the list of blocked web-sites. This is an action.

ebx_RemoveItem._message.comment: ARIA caption for a button to remove an item from the list. This is an action.

ebx_duplicateBlockedSite.message: This site is already on the blocked sites list
ebx_duplicateBlockedSite._message.comment: Error message when the user tries to add a duplicate entry to the blocked sites list.

ebx_editorEnableAnnouncementTitle.message: Welcome to the Office Browser Extension
ebx_editorEnableAnnouncementTitle._message.comment: Title of the announcement to notify user that the Editor is now enabled.

ebx_editorEnableAnnouncementText.message: The Office Browser Extension allows you to view, edit, and create Office files within the browser. It also includes Editor writing tool which enables spelling, grammar, and style checks as you type across most websites.
ebx_editorEnableAnnouncementText._message.comment: Text of the announcement to notify user that the Editor is now enabled.

ebx_editorEnableAnnouncementSettings._message.comment: Text of a link to open the settings page.

ebx_feedbackSendTo.message: Editor is available as a Microsoft Internal Preview. Please send feedback and bugs to
ebx_feedbackSendTo._message.comment: Text in front of the link to submit the feedback via email.
